scripts.install-all: npm install && cd socket-server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev:server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.dev:socket: cd socket-server && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.json server.ts
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:socket" "npm run dev:client"
